import React from "react"; import { Stats, BigBreadcrumbs, WidgetGrid, JarvisWidget } from "../../../common"; import SparklineContainer from "../../../common/graphs/inline/components/SparklineContainer"; import Datatable from "../../../common/tables/components/Datatable"; export default class Projects extends React.Component { render() { const options = { ajax: "assets/api/projects/project-list.json", iDisplayLength: 15, columns: [ { class: "details-control", orderable: false, data: null, defaultContent: "" }, { data: "name" }, { data: "est" }, { data: "contacts" }, { data: "status" }, { data: "target-actual" }, { data: "starts" }, { data: "ends" }, { data: "tracker" } ], order: [[1, "asc"]] }; return (
{/* row */}
NOTE: All the data is loaded from a seperate JSON file
{/* Widget ID (each widget will need unique ID)*/}

Widget Title

{/* widget div*/}
{/* widget content */}
Projects EST Contacts Status Target/ Actual Starts Ends Tracker {/* */}
{/* end widget content */}
{/* end widget div */}
{/* end row */}
); } } function detailsFormat(d) { return `
Project Title: ${d.name}
Deadline: ${d.ends}
Extra info: And any further details here (images etc)...
Comments: ${d.comments}
Action: ${d.action}
`; }
